seller_description: he KYY 15.6-Inch FHD 1080P Portable Monitor is designed to deliver exceptional performance with its advanced IPS screen offering a 1920x1080 resolution, HDR technology, and a 178° wide viewing angle. Ideal for gaming and multimedia, this monitor ensures smooth visuals, vibrant color rendering, and eye-care features such as reduced blue light radiation and flicker-free viewing, making it comfortable for extended use. Equipped with 2 USB Type-C ports and a Mini-HDMI port, this portable monitor provides wide compatibility with laptops, smartphones, PCs, PS4, XBOX, Nintendo Switch, and other devices supporting Thunderbolt 3 or USB-C 3.1. With a slim 0.3-inch profile and lightweight design of just 1.7 lbs, it easily fits into your bag for on-the-go productivity or entertainment. The included scratch-proof PU leather smart cover doubles as a stand with adjustable viewing angles, ensuring durability and convenience. The monitor features built-in stereo speakers and a 3.5mm audio jack, enhancing the audio experience, while its premium gray metal finish adds a sleek touch. Supporting both landscape and portrait modes, the KYY monitor is perfect for gaming, dual-monitor setups, or phone screen extensions, all backed by a friendly menu control wheel and 24/7 professional support.
review: Very satisfied with this portable monitor. Set up was easy and instructions were clear. It came with attachments for Macbook (USB-C) and laptop (HDMI) and an external output. It will work without the external output as well as long as it can draw power from the connection (e.g., plugging it in your laptop). I've been using it with my MacBook air and it's been working smoothly. I like that ease of connection. The only thing I would note is that the magnetic cover can be a little tricky to figure out at first but once you have it working, it'll get easier.

The seller’s description highlights its advanced IPS screen, which delivers stunning 1920x1080 resolution with HDR technology, a wide 178° viewing angle, and eye-care features like reduced blue light and flicker-free visuals, ensuring long-lasting comfort. Its ultra-slim 0.3-inch profile, lightweight design of 1.7 lbs, and versatile connectivity options, including two USB-C ports and a Mini-HDMI port, make it ideal for various devices such as laptops, smartphones, PCs, and gaming consoles. Additionally, the scratch-proof PU leather smart cover doubles as a sturdy stand, and the monitor supports both portrait and landscape modes, complemented by built-in stereo speakers and a premium gray metal finish for added sophistication. The buyer’s review aligns well with the seller's promises, affirming ease of setup, compatibility with multiple devices, and smooth operation with a MacBook Air. They appreciated the included accessories and clear instructions, noting only a minor learning curve with the magnetic cover. The buyer's images and description match the seller’s product, confirming satisfaction with its portability and functionality. There are no discrepancies between the seller’s claims and the buyer’s experience, and the product has met expectations. Thus, the seller has delivered as promised, and the buyer's satisfaction reflects the product's quality and performance. Conclusion: Seller delivered as described, and the buyer is satisfied.
